title: Foundation & A/L Studies
description: Focus on the Mathematics or Technology stream for your G.C.E. Advanced Levels (A/L). Strong results in subjects like Combined Mathematics, Physics, and ICT are crucial for university admission.

title: Bachelor's Degree in IT/CS/SE
description: Enroll in a Bachelor of Science (BSc) degree program in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or Information Technology. This is the most critical step to build a strong theoretical and practical foundation.

title: Internship / Trainee Software Engineer
description: Gain practical industry experience through an internship. This is where you apply your academic knowledge to real-world projects and learn about industry best practices, teamwork, and professional conduct.

title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Secure your first full-time role as a Software Engineer. You'll work as part of a development team, contributing to features, fixing bugs, and learning from senior engineers.
institutes: All major IT companies in Sri Lanka

title: Senior Software Engineer & Specialization
description: After gaining experience, you'll be promoted to a senior role with more responsibility. This is a good time to specialize in a specific area like Frontend, Backend, DevOps, Mobile, or AI/ML.
qualifications: Proven track record of successful projects
skills: Advanced expertise in a chosen domain
